events.description: The release of retail sales data for Bulgaria for the month of December 2025, showing significant growth.

facts.fact_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025.

evidences.evidence_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025, following a 3.1% gain in the previous month.

facts.fact_text: Sales in household appliances, furniture, and other household goods grew by 29.3%.

evidences.evidence_text: household appliances, furniture, and other household goods (29.3% vs 15.3%)

facts.fact_text: Retail activity in food, beverages, and tobacco declined by 4.6% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: Meanwhile, activity declined further in food, beverages, and tobacco (-4.6% vs -2%).

facts.fact_text: On a monthly basis, retail sales grew by 1.6% in December.

evidences.evidence_text: On a monthly basis, retail sales grew by 1.6% in December, following an upwardly revised 0.2% growth in the preceding period.

claims.claim_text: The December 2025 retail sales growth marked the sharpest rise in retail activity in eleven months.

evidences.evidence_text: This marked the sharpest rise in retail activity in eleven months

evidence.evidence_text: Retail sales in Bulgaria rose by 7.7% year-on-year in December 2025
sales increased sharply in automotive fuel and lubricants (11.8% vs 10.3%) and non-food products excluding fuel (15.7% vs 5.9% in November)
